languages.text: "Осаду мира ведет эскадра флота Осознание, поддерживаемая объединенным флотом из кораблей со всего Простора. Среди последних мы фиксируем суда, рекрутированные Лорд-инквизитором для обороны сектора. Им противостоит сборище подонков из Последнего восхода, возглавляемое богохульными предателями из банды Несущих Слово".

traits.locale_text: "С одной стороны объединенный флот Адептус Механикус и кораблей со всего Простора, рекрутированных Лорд-инквизитором. Им противостоит флот подонков из Последнего рассвета, возглавляемый кораблями богохульных предателей из легиона Несущих Слово".

languages.text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."
languages.original_text: "Осаду мира ведет эскадра флота Осознание, поддерживаемая объединенным флотом из кораблей со всего Простора. Среди последних мы фиксируем суда, рекрутированные Лорд-инквизитором для обороны сектора. Им противостоит сборище подонков из Последнего восхода, возглавляемое богохульными предателями из банды Несущих Слово".

traits.locale_text: "The loyal forces are represented by the joint squadron of the Cognisance Fleet and the vessels from across the entire Expanse recruited by the Lord Inquisitor. They are opposed by the scum from the Final Dawn led by the ships of the blasphemous traitors from the Word Bearers Legion."

"The loyal forces are represented by the joint squadron of the Cognisance Fleet and the vessels from across the entire Expanse recruited by the Lord Inquisitor. They are opposed by the scum from the Final Dawn led by the ships of the blasphemous traitors from the Word Bearers Legion."

Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

languages.text: “这个世界被隶属于真理开拓者舰队的中队包围了，得到了整个科罗努斯扩区的联合舰队的支持。我们发现联合舰队中包括大审判官招募来保卫扩区的舰队。目前，联合舰队遭到了终末黎明邪恶的负隅反抗，那群渣滓的领导人是来自怀言者军团的叛徒。”
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界被隶属于真理开拓者舰队的中队包围了，得到了整个科罗努斯扩区的联合舰队的支持。我们发现联合舰队中包括审判长招募来保卫扩区的舰队。目前，联合舰队遭到了终末黎明邪恶的负隅反抗，那群渣滓的领导人是来自怀言者军团的叛徒。”

languages.text: « La planète est assiégée par un escadron de la Flotte de la Connaissance, soutenu par une armada de vaisseaux en provenance de toutes les Étendues. Parmi ces derniers, nous avons identifié des vaisseaux engagés par le seigneur inquisiteur pour défendre le secteur. Ils font face à la vermine de l'Aube finale, menée par ces traîtres blasphémateurs de Word Bearers. »
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

traits.locale_text: « La planète est assiégée par un escadron de la Flotte de la Connaissance, soutenu par une armada de vaisseaux en provenance de toutes les Étendues. Parmi ces derniers, nous avons identifié des vaisseaux engagés par le seigneur inquisiteur pour défendre le secteur. Ils font face à la vermine de l'Aube finale, menée par ces traîtres blasphémateurs de Word Bearers. »

languages.text: "Die Welt wird von einem Geschwader der Erkenntnisflotte belagert. Unterstützt wird sie von einer vereinten Schiffsarmada aus der gesamten Ausdehnung. Zu letzteren gehören Schiffe, die vom Großinquisitor zur Verteidigung des Sektors rekrutiert wurden. Sie stehen dem Abschaum der letzten Dämmerung gegenüber, der von den blasphemischen Verrätern aus den Reihen der Word Bearers angeführt wird."
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

traits.locale_text: "Die Welt wird von einem Geschwader der Erkenntnisflotte belagert. Unterstützt wird sie von einer vereinten Schiffsarmada aus der gesamten Ausdehnung. Zu letzteren gehören Schiffe, die vom Großinquisitor zur Verteidigung des Sektors rekrutiert wurden. Sie stehen dem Abschaum der letzten Dämmerung gegenüber, der von den blasphemischen Verrätern aus den Reihen der Word Bearers angeführt wird."

languages.text: «Un escuadrón de la Flota Conciencia, con la ayuda de una armada conjunta de naves provenientes de toda la Extensión, ha asediado este mundo. En cuanto a las naves de apoyo, algunas las ha reclutado el Lord Inquisidor para defender el sector. Se enfrentan a la escoria del Amanecer Final liderada por los traidores blasfemos de los Portadores de la Palabra».
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

traits.locale_text: «Un escuadrón de la Flota Conciencia, con la ayuda de una armada conjunta de naves provenientes de toda la Extensión, ha asediado este mundo. En cuanto a las naves de apoyo, algunas las ha reclutado el Lord Inquisidor para defender el sector. Se enfrentan a la escoria del Amanecer Final liderada por los traidores blasfemos de los Portadores de la Palabra».

languages.text: 「惑星は、エクスパンス全域からの合同艦隊が支援するコグニサンス艦隊によって包囲されている。合同艦隊のうち、我々はこのセクターを防衛するためにロード・インクィジターによって採用された艦船を登録している。彼らは、ワードベアラーの隊列に属する冒涜的な裏切り者たちが率いる最後の夜明け教団のクズどもに抵抗している」
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星は、エクスパンス全域からの合同艦隊が支援するコグニサンス艦隊によって包囲されている。合同艦隊のうち、我々はこのセクターを防衛するためにロード・インクィジターによって採用された艦船を登録している。彼らは、ワードベアラーの隊列に属する冒涜的な裏切り者たちが率いる最後の夜明け教団のクズどもに抵抗している」

languages.text: "Dünyayı kuşatan Malumat Filosu eskadrası, Enginlik'in dört bir yanından saflarına katılan gemilerce destekleniyor. Bunların arasında sektörün savunulması için Lord Engizisyoncu'nun temin ettirdiği gemiler de bulunuyor. Karşılarında Vahyedenler denen hain kâfirlerin önderlik ettiği, adi Nihai Şafak müritleri yer alıyor."
languages.original_text: "The world is besieged by a squadron of the Cognisance Fleet supported by a joint armada of vessels from across the entire Expanse. Among the latter, we are registering vessels recruited by the Lord Inquisitor to defend the sector. They are opposed by the Final Dawn scum led by the blasphemous traitors from the ranks of the Word Bearers."
